mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_challenge ( challenge_title, challenge_content, recruitment_num, start_date, end_date, host_user, xp, thumbnail_url, challenge_category_code, challenge_status, created_at ) VALUES ( #{challengeTitle}, #{challengeContent}, #{recruitmentNum}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{hostUser}, #{xp}, #{thumbnailUrl}, #{challengeCategoryCode}, #{challengeStatus}, #{createdAt} )
INSERT INTO tbl_challenge_part ( challenge_code, created_at, user_code, is_host ) VALUES ( #{challengeCode}, #{createdAt}, #{userCode}, #{isHost} )
